title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Augmented Reality-Based Electro-Pneumatic Practical Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic electrical circuits and simple pneumatic systems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the components and operating principles of electro-pneumatic systems through 3D augmented reality models.
Learners can design and simulate electro-pneumatic circuits using augmented reality markers in a virtual laboratory.
Learners can propose electro-pneumatic systems applicable to real industrial settings through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
